thread.title: BRIEF-Ardagh Group Responds To Patent Ruling

title: BRIEF-Ardagh Group Responds To Patent Ruling

organizations.name: brief-ardagh group responds to patent ruling reuters

text: March 9, 2018 / 2:53 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-Ardagh Group Responds To Patent Ruling Reuters Staff March 9 (Reuters) - Ardagh Group SA: * ARDAGH GROUP S.A. RESPONDS TO PATENT RULING * ARDAGH GROUP - TRIAL JUDGE CONFIRMED JURY VERDICT AGAINST UNIT IN CONNECTION WITH PATENT INFRINGEMENT ALLEGATIONS BY GREEN MOUNTAIN LLC * ARDAGH GROUP SA - ‍WILL NOW APPEAL VERDICT RELATED TO PATENT INFRINGEMENT ALLEGATIONS BY GREEN MOUNTAIN​ TO FEDERAL APPEALS COURT Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
